abstract: House is attempting to put together measure funding most of Homeland Security Dept, while stopping Pres Obama's executive action on immigration; bill is seen as unlikely to be approved by Senate, and Obama has threatened a veto if it does pass.
lead_paragraph: A bill House leaders are pursuing is unlikely to clear the Senate, where Republicans will need at least half a dozen Democratic votes to overcome a filibuster.
snippet: A bill House leaders are pursuing is unlikely to clear the Senate, where Republicans will need at least half a dozen Democratic votes to overcome a filibuster.

headline.main: G.O.P. Aims to Fund Homeland Security While Blocking Obama’s Immigration Plan
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Aims to Fund Homeland Security While Blocking Obama’s Immigration Plan
